amendment.description: To provide for the preservation and archiving of geological and geophysical data through establishment of a data archive system and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1394 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1394 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9941-9942; text: CR S9941-9942) To provide for the preservation and archiving of geological and geophysical data through establishment of a data archive system and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1394 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1394 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
